name: Thematic Solitaire: Noir
description:
Thematic Solitaire! Immerse yourself in a fascinating world and enjoy moments of relaxation with a unique atmosphere! Play the classic Klondike Solitaire in captivating themed styles. In this new game in the series, let yourself be drawn into the atmosphere of noir, where you take on the role of a solitary detective on a rainy night, enjoying a game of cards while jazz fills the air.

"One more crime solved and so many more to solve! My head is heavy and the night arrives, all I want on this rainy night is to stay in the office playing Classic Solitaire!"



Challenge yourself to carefully plan each move, organizing the cards into strategic sequences. Enjoy the feeling of relaxation and focus as you indulge in the pleasure of the classic card game. Thematic Solitaire is perfect for Solitaire lovers who crave a thematic and immersive experience.

"No crimes tonight! I feel that the office is the only safe and comfortable place."

  • Classic Solitaire (Klondike)!
  • Atmospheric Noir Ambiance!
  • Play Statistics!
  • Simple to play, but persistently challenging!



Experience Thematic Solitaire and savor moments of tranquility, immersion, and fun. Discover the noir atmosphere as you play cards on a rainy night, accompanied by the captivating sound of jazz. Get ready for a unique Solitaire experience, where each game is a fascinating journey.

"I wanted this to be real!"
